ComicInfo.Summary:
Robyn has escaped the prison walls, but is now on the run in the dangerous jungle surrounding it. Hunted by her enemies and the deadly Executioner, she must find her way to freedom, but she will need to survive first.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Sanju Nivangune | 1 | B | Cover B | Netho Diaz & Mohan Sivakami | 5 | C | Cover C | Noah Salonga & Ceci de la Cruz | 6 | D | Cover D | Robert Atkins & Jorge Cortes | 7 | E | New York Comic Con Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | 3 | F | New York Comic Con Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Elias Chatzoudis | 2 | G | MCM Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | 4 | H | MCM Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | Missing | I | New York Comic Con Exclusive ZenBox Variant Cover | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | Missing | J | New York Comic Con Exclusive Foil Cosplay Variant Cover | Sabine Rich | Missing |
